post.text:
Join us LIVE at 6:30pmE! Our nightly campaign coverage from Trump Tower!

This is a HISTORIC movement. Together, we will once again make a government by, for, and of the people! Help us close out the final weeks of this campaign strong and WIN.
Contribute $10 Now >> www.DonaldJTrump.com/Live

comment.author: Sierra
comment.text: He's awesome...how he has withstood the liberal media attacks for over a year amazes me...Let's all PRAY for him and his safety!

replies.author: David
replies.text: Thank you, Sierra ! :) I think you are AWESOME! God is MERCIFUL! He is giving America ANOTHER CHANCE -- may WE BE FOUND FAITHFUL! PRAY, PRAY, PRAY in Jesus' name!

replies.author: John
replies.text: I pray every day for him.

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: I don't see where he gets all this Energy Just wait when he turns all that Energy on Changing things in Washington! LOL
